title: Atheism vs Agnosticism
author: VD
content_html:
The definitive difference:

Agnostic: “I doubt there is a God. Because I haven’t seen the evidence.”

Atheist: “There is no God. Because I’m an asshole.”

No doubt Aardvark will soon have the t-shirts….
content_text:
The definitive difference:
Agnostic:  “I doubt there is a God.  Because I haven’t seen the evidence.”
Atheist:  “There is no God.  Because I’m an asshole.”
No doubt Aardvark will soon have the t-shirts….
